mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, c.campground_name, c.addr_full, r.reservation_date, r.end_date, r.total_price, r.reservation_status FROM campia_reservations r JOIN campia_campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campia_campgrounds c ON s.campground_id = c.campground_id WHERE r.provider_code = #{providerCode} AND r.provider_user_id = #{providerUserId} AND r.reservation_status = 1 ORDER BY r.reservation_date ASC
